stimulusHtml: How many times will  doSomething()  be called as a result of executing this code segment?

features.html:
The following code segment appears in a method in the same class as the method  doSomething().

 

int i = 1;
while (i < 3)
{
   for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++)
   {
      doSomething();
   }
   i++;
}
